special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, the first spell target opponent casts costs {1} more to cast.
[-2]: For each player, return up to one other target nonland permanent that player controls to its owner’s hand. You gain 2 life.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts a spell, attacks with a creature, activates a non mana activated ability or draws a card, they may pay {1}. If they don’t, they lose the game.”
